Source.Name: perl-http-negotiate
Source.Summary: HTTP::Negotiate - choose a variant to serve
Source.Description: This module provides a complete implementation of the HTTP content negotiation algorithm specified in draft-ietf-http-v11-spec-00.ps chapter 12. Content negotiation allows for the selection of a preferred content representation based upon attributes of the negotiable variants and the value of the various Accept* header fields in the request.
